00020 #include "FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor.h"
00021 #include "FusionCHPMultiDataData.h"
00022 #include "FusionCHPData.h"
00023 
00024 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor::FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor()
00029 {
00030 }
00031 
00032 FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor::~FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor()
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 bool FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor::Initialize(const vector<string> &chps)
00037 {
00038     // Clear the map
00039     snpNameIndexMap.clear();
00040 
00041     // Store the chp file names.
00042     chpFileNames = chps;
00043     if (chps.size() == 0)
00044         return false;
00045 
00046     // Read the first chp file.
00047     FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(chpFileNames[0]);
00048     if (chp == NULL)
00049         return false;
00050     FusionCHPMultiDataData *mchp = FusionCHPMultiDataData::FromBase(chp);
00051     if (mchp == NULL)
00052     {
00053         delete chp;
00054         return false;
00055     }
00056 
00057     // Extract the probe set names
00058     int n = mchp->GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00059     for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00060         snpNameIndexMap[mchp->GetProbeSetName(GenotypeMultiDataType, i)] = i;
00061 
00062     // Close the file and return
00063     delete mchp;
00064     return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor::ExtractData(const vector<string> &snps, vector<vector<u_int8_t> > &calls, vector<vector<float> > &confidences)
00068 {
00069     int nchps = (int)chpFileNames.size();
00070     calls.resize(nchps);
00071     confidences.resize(nchps);
00072 
00073     // Create a vector of CHP file indicies given the SNP names. This is
00074     // done to reduce the number of lookups in the map object.
00075     int nsnps = (int)snps.size();
00076     vector<int> snpIndicies(nsnps);
00077     for (int isnp=0; isnp<nsnps; isnp++)
00078     {
00079         snpIndicies[isnp] = snpNameIndexMap[snps[isnp]];
00080     }
00081 
00082     // Loop over the chp files and extract the snp data
00083     FusionCHPData *chp = NULL;
00084     FusionCHPMultiDataData *mchp = NULL;
00085     for (int ichp=0; ichp<nchps; ichp++)
00086     {
00087         // Open the CHP file
00088         chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(chpFileNames[ichp]);
00089         mchp = FusionCHPMultiDataData::FromBase(chp);
00090         if (mchp == NULL)
00091         {
00092             calls[ichp].clear();
00093             confidences[ichp].clear();
00094             delete chp;
00095             chp = NULL;
00096             mchp = NULL;
00097             continue;
00098         }
00099 
00100         // Extract the data
00101         calls[ichp].resize(nsnps);
00102         confidences[ichp].resize(nsnps);
00103         for (int isnp=0; isnp<nsnps; isnp++)
00104         {
00105             calls[ichp][isnp] = mchp->GetGenoCall(GenotypeMultiDataType, snpIndicies[isnp]);
00106             confidences[ichp][isnp] = mchp->GetGenoConfidence(GenotypeMultiDataType, snpIndicies[isnp]);
00107         }
00108 
00109         // Close the file
00110         delete mchp;
00111    }
00112 }
